properties.entry: INSERT INTO EMPLOYEE (EMP_NAME, EMP_NO, EMAIL, PHONE, DEPT_CODE, JOB_CODE, SAL_LEVEL, SALARY, BONUS, MANAGER_ID, HIRE_DATE, ENT_DATE, ENT_YN) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE EMPLOYEE SET EMAIL = ? ,PHONE = ? ,DEPT_CODE = ? ,SALARY = ? ,BONUS = ? WHERE EMP_ID = ?
SELECT EMP_ID, EMP_NAME, EMP_NO, EMAIL, PHONE, DEPT_CODE, JOB_CODE, SAL_LEVEL, SALARY, BONUS, MANAGER_ID, HIRE_DATE, ENT_DATE, ENT_YN FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_ID = ?
